edu.sjsu.cs.ghost151

Class BoardObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.sjsu.cs.ghost151.BoardObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ghost

    public class BoardObject
extends java.lang.Object
    A BoardObject is the basic unit stored within the Board. It stores information about its type and position and provides a mechanism for retrieving its String representation
